SELECT a.id, co.course_name AS courseName, e.name AS teacherName, a.status FROM class_student cs INNER JOIN class cl ON cs.class_id = cl.id INNER JOIN course co ON cl.course_id = co.id INNER JOIN employee e ON cl.teacher_id = e.id INNER JOIN attendance a ON cl.id = a.class_id WHERE cs.employee_id = #{employeeId}
